titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to correct the tariff rate inversion on certain iron and steel pipe and tube products.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/19/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to impose a duty on certain non-alloyed iron and steel pipes and tubes. Increases the duty on certain other steel pipes. Increases the duty on certain alloyed iron and steel pipes and tubes. Increases the duty on certain finished steel conduits.
